text: Naïma Moreira-Laliberté (born October 30, 1996) is a Canadian Equestrian Team athlete in dressage. She is reigning Pan American Games champion in team dressage, when she won gold in 2019 in Lima with Jill Irving, Tina Irwin, and Lindsay Kellock. Moreira-Laliberté was born in Montreal and grew up in Outremont, Quebec. ==References== ==External links== Category:1996 births Category:Canadian female equestrians Category:Living people Category:Equestrians at the 2019 Pan American Games Category:Sportspeople from Montreal Category:Pan American Games gold medalists for Canada Category:Pan American Games medalists in equestrian
title: Naïma Moreira-Laliberté
